nVo1vNNCgZnqSwcq35bYWA.text: Super cute place however, we sat ourselves and nobody acknowledged us. There was more staff than patrons and we didn't even get a hello. The patio bartender finally asked if we'd been helped. We had a drink and bailed. The servers were more into doing their makeup in the bathroom than serving. Probably won't be back... it's too bad because I really hoped this could be our new neighborhood bar but the staff seems to think they're working in Scottsdale.

_67UN2Abz18-L5n5ljfpZQ.text: This place is OK. Nothing like I thought it would be. The live band is nice the service sucked and the food sucks. I sat at the bar and the service wasn't that great and the dark black hair bartender was rude. She kept talking to the other bartenders talking about the customers calling them idiots. Anyways We got the nachos and the wings. The nachos weren't too bad but not worth $12 not even piled high or real cheese or salsa and the wings absolutely sucked that's probably what did it for me I was craving to have some wings before we even got here and when we got them I had 2 and my wife had 1 and we were done the waitress asked me if I wanted a box and I told her no that's OK she asked if we weren't that hungry and I told her how bad they tasted. The wings tasted like they had a little soap in them very dry and the taste was horrible and then what did it for me and made me decide never to come back here again was the waitress charged me for them. I love wings and have never thrown wings out or wasted them bit these were horrible don't get them. Then when I asked for my tab it took 15mins to get my tab, and I was sitting at the bar. It was almost like she was mad I told her I didn't like the wings. The best part about the night was the band, that's it. I will not be coming back here. The old place here was Beef O Brady's and they had better food.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Middle of the bar

8_YMS5zlbTx3Hiod2lAgbA.text: I really enjoy coming here for a drink and music. The only complaint is the service.  Seems like 3/4 of the time you can't get someone's attention unless your sitting at the bar or you have to flagged the servers down to get a drink or food. Great prices, food is good, cocktails delicious too! Just pay attention, I have left more than twice bc I was ignored for over 10 min without being acknowledged.

wAO7-zPBsgqQqWFjd8x3pg.text: Good fish tacos. Yummy pretzels. Beer nice and cold! Service was awesome! Wish some of the beer on their draft menu wasn't as sweet, but I'll definitely come back.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

r0bRBxtR66mw77SrfDmOqg.text: I love GTC. They have great music and excellent food. However Tuesday night , July 30th was not their best. I sat at an empty table on the side and waited 10 minutes and nobody approached me. I finally walked up to a server and asked her for a menu and a bud light. A few minutes later, both came to me. The French dip with garlic fries sounded great. Again I waited 15 minutes this time and nobody came back. I found my server and asked her to close me out and paid her for the beer and 1.00 tip. Of course I did not leave her side for fear of being lost again. I left and ate at another place. It appeared 2 servers were trying to cover 20 tables. Need some better floor management .

XLos2qBtI39BtwsPHKkQMg.text: Only reason for 4 stars was service started off slow, had to ask for menus after waiting 10 minutes at the table. Once server came over, the service was very friendly and smooth. The food was fantastic; I had the barbacoa beef enchiladas with red sauce and hubby had the barbacoa beef grande burrito. Good prices and great value, very generous happy hour times, and fun relaxed atmosphere. We will definitely go back to try more of the menu!

KxER3s850lixr0UZgbZY6A.text: Cool neighborhood bar & grill .. live music on the patio outside or sit inside and enjoy music on the jukebox..   We stopped in on a Saturday afternoon for early Happy Hour!! And half of the bar was celebrating a patrons 80th birthday .. as they made their way to the indoor stage to hear his funny speech and thank people who had traveled from various states to be with him.. we all got to join in and sing happy birthday to him!! What a great experience!!  I enjoyed a couple of jack & cokes (nice pour) and then the low carb Mex plate with a combo of pulled pork and shredded chicken .. lettuce for faux tacos, shredded cheese, sour cream, guacamole, pico de Gallo .. all fresh items!!   Lots of healthy options on the menu if you're low-carb or Keto.. they have low carb items !!  We'll definitely be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Lo carb Mex w/pulled pork &amp; chicken

vioZBJH8F2HqyHerbA-22w.text: Glad I found this place. I met a girlfriend here for lunch. It was dark and cool (important in the summer), the staff was friendly and attentive without being overbearing or False. The food was great. We had the rustic nachos with green chile pork. It was a very large portion loaded with all the good stuff. Muy delicioso! The chips are worth mentioning as they were fresh, thick and tasty and not overly salted. We both had burgers. I had the Lea & Perrins mushroom Swiss my friend had the Doc Holliday both of which came with fries. The burgers were huge and delicious. We both took half home. It was just as good the next day. We were both so pleased with our experience. It's a bar to be sure but one with unusually good food and that's hard to find. We will definitely be coming back and I will bring others here as well. I see they have live music every night. That's another reason to come back.  Great job Charli and staff!

gBt2sPpjim7-kzXZkXI6xQ.text: This place has become the go to spot for my office crew for happy hour. Never a dull moment here with their beer selection and eats.  They have a food menu, haven't been here for lunch yet but maybe one day I will pop on over.

q34jtgQWRWn-TCTfthBCoA.text: Went for the first time Friday Night. This place was packed! We were seated quick (two of us).   Our server was Alex. He was attentive and never left our drinks dry. Great service!  Had the chicken wings. The plumpest, biggest wings we've had yet! Impressive! The Habanero has a kick of heat & the Garlic Parmesan were tasty too!  Great Happy Hour Deals- Mixed & Well Drinks $3.50. Beer Specials @ low prices as well. They offer about 6 menu items at half the cost. Hours are Mon-Friday 5PM to 7PM. Special Brunch offerings on Sunday's.  Pizza- Pepperoni had them add fresh basil & garlic. It was delicious.  Menu had quite a bit to offer. From burgers & sandwiches to salads, burritos and more..   The restaurant feature live bands Friday & Saturday's from 8PM-12AM, Lounge Piano Player Thursday's evenings. Offer plant & paint classes. Also, feature a local live DJ that plays from 12AM-2AM on Friday & Saturday Nights.   Fun spot that seems to have many locals and is always busy!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

VdbdiS-0N7ljqMVlhjgNLA.text: Completely blown away with the service and atmosphere!!!!! Live music every night!!! Food is great and this will be a regular spot for the wife and I.

th1JOGqt0XD28dczDB5dJA.text: Gotta love Good times, great food, great service, and music always, what a place !! Cheese curds !!!

dbZAVqF_9pC3d2cJ3HLiug.text: Love this place! Super chill outdoor seating was great! Will come back again. The wings are delicious!!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Bloody Mary

wgFH_EFloqCPYAhGbo0IZQ.text: One of the valleys best sports bars to say the least. Our neighborhood favorite. A weekly tradition. We never have not had a good time at GTC. The staff is always helpful. The beer is always cold and the wings are some of the best I've ever had. I love to get my wings extra crispy, grilled smothered in hot BBQ. Yum!!! What we love most about GTC is the kid-friendliness, it's family owned and Charli is next level mom goals for owning a bar and also making the bar accessible for their parents with kiddos! Win/win for everyone! Also, not to exaggerate but the green Chile quesadilla is hands down AMAZING. The green chili pork is extremely flavorful with a hint of sweet. Order what I suggest and ya can't go wrong!

QpW6qf4tAcnazunjAj2xuA.text: I really want to give this place a better review but I can't.  This place is a little neighborhood spot we've been coming to since it used to be the Regal Beagle and then some other place and now Charli's.    I really like the changes that Charli's has made to this place and their food is excellent.    So why the 3-star review?  The last 3-4 times we have visited, there is an overwhelming smell of incense in the restaurant, it may be from a candle.  It's not a bad smell, per say, but just way too strong for a restaurant.  When I'm eating my food, I want to smell the food, not incense.   We have mentioned this to the staff a couple times and they have indicated it's the owner's preference to have the candle lit.   Anyway, we love this place and want it to be successful.  I hope the owner does read reviews and understand the smell in the restaurant is turning business away, we have walked out a couple times after sitting for a few minutes trying to get accustomed to the smell, but not being able to.

ScKEBkIc3cxvKBulK6eIrQ.text: Fun place to eat,drink, and be merry   Visited on a Thursday (Dueling Piano Night) Had a great time.  The music was Great  Next time I am in town, will definitely be coming back

seoQWPV1-hiyc7WNsJvuyA.text: Good food and drinks. Fun atmosphere and music as well. Service was good drinks were strong

MtZXZxDLwAYNt0o42_XJXA.text: Ordered bruschetta and a burger over the phone to go.  They were pretty friendly and while it was very busy when I arrived but I was able to pay in less than 10 min.  The issue was the quality of the food. I have dined in and ate their bruschetta a few times before without any complaints.  However, the two choices ("Zach Brown" and "Fancy") I ordered were smothered in fig and caramelized onions to the point where the bread was soggy and there wasn't much goat cheese on either one when both said they came with it.  Very little micro greens, they appeared to be more of a garnishment.  The lemon herb chicken was dry, hard, and seemed like it came from a bag and was reheated.  It was cut in tiny pieces so not much substance. I usually eat food even when it isn't the best I've had but I had to throw it away, it was not appetizing in the least.

S60Qljavxq6iVXTdOLJihQ.text: This place is great!  Live music, dancing, cheap drinks and the service is awesome.  I wish I could remember our server's name as he handled a very busy bar and we never had a wait for a drink.    The bands are great, rock, pop, R&B, country even reggae.  Great neighborhood bar atmosphere.  Can't review the food as I've only been there after dinner but will try it soon.   New favorite live music hangout.  Kinda reluctant to post this as I don't want it to get too busy but I think you'll enjoy this place.

e5j2bRXhHTts067vn-k2Nw.text: Good food. The shrimp and fish tacos were awesome. The breadsticks as an appetizer were delicious. Friendly but slow service even though they weren't busy. Fun relaxed atmosphere. Great lunch menu.

xdgbUGNawAHr6QijIqBkkQ.text: I have frequented this place since they opened 2 years ago, it still amazes me how hands-on the owner Charli still is. Seeing an owner be so actively involved and loving her customers is so refreshing.   New menu is outstanding, so many appetizers to choose from. The food is really good here and definitely a good value. I love how Charli isn't afraid to offer high-profile food and not just frozen food dropped in a deep fryer. You can definitely taste the freshness of her recipes here.  The live music scene here is unsurpassed. There is such a wide variety of experience and genres and is offered what seems like all the time. It is soooo nice to just know if you want live music, Good Time Charli's is the place to be.  My only personal dislike is the super cool patio has really bad airflow (even though it's outside) and there is always an over abundance of smokers. It's really really smokey! Some addition outside fans (not blasting on high and whizzing in your face) could definitely help here.

HquGb158tbDFckx9sWwbJA.text: We come here quite often for work happy hour.  Good service,  good beer, good food.  My favorite is the cheese curds.  If you are looking for laid back,  this is definitely the place to come.  Check it out.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

nEsPGh1v6X2SnBvxI4tfeQ.text: We had to wait 30-40 minutes for our food, as there was a miscommunication with one of our orders with the kitchen. When the food came, it tasted good, but pricey for some of the items.  My salad was huge and only $5. meanwhile the "basket" of garlic fries for $5.50 was not bigger than a side order.  The taco combo came with 3 tacos and a side of beans for $15, not $14 as it stated on the menu. The bruschetta came with 4 little pieces for $9.  On other positive side, the water was cool and entertaining, and got us our bruschetta on the house as it came 10 minutes after the other items, which were already taking a long time.  The bar is cool with the lights, and the music selection was unique, you never hear Clutch anywhere. I like the place, I may try again, hope they can come out with the food in a more timely manner and either lower prices and enlarge portions :)

nqmYDav2BAjPgic6T1qXCA.text: Fantastic food, very friendly and welcoming staff. We stopped here on a whim and are so glad we did. We had the cheese curds, garlic cheese knots and tacos and a salad. Everything was truly amazing.

6q-Vlhpk2lDXHvyEraCfcg.text: Good food, cold beer, friendly staff. Food is typical bar fair but the servings are large..

zMGoB_FXyT_jnelnh7z6Sw.text: Great atmosphere, people and staff. Food was fresh and tasted fresh. This is a place I'll definitely come back to visit. Good Time Charlie sets the bar for what a neighborhood hangout spot should be like and that's always striving to deliver the best to the customer.

wtBHi05Xfi_36A5hFheC0A.text: Great food, great drinks but the slowest service that I have ever seen in a local restaurant bar with about 10 people in the place.  This is about the 5th time we have been here hoping each time that the service gets better just to be disappointed. It's really a shame because the food is fantastic!!

zQE8RSBPEkiffY6Q3mZNkA.text: Four of us went here on a Sunday night.  Sat down at a table.  Waited 15 minutes.  No one came by for drinks or food.  We were never even acknowledged.  One and DONE!  Will never go back.  Maybe this dump will close and something with service will take its place.

ZsBpJHCMvxL62v7uBoR-Iw.text: What a at place this little corner bar and eatery is! The foods is great and the draft beers are cold.   We've been waiting some time for it to open and we're pleasantly rewarded for our patience!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Great food.
Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

cuiGUcAu44pwTKjIkCseSA.text: GTC lives up to its "neighborhood pub" rep. We walked in around 11:30 on a Friday night and there was live music and a decent amount of people were there dancing and singing to the live music. Such an awesome atmosphere and it seemed like the people there were really enjoying it! The beer list consisted of mostly local drafts. The service was awful, though. Our server triple-checked our IDs and so badly wanted to accuse us of being underage. Ahh, the perks of looking young! We probably won't be back, but it is a nice place to hang out.

83515-C_Hw6Ka-Hwlibuug.text: My first visit was on Customer Appreciation Day. Great music, great food and excellent staff! As packed as it was I was very impressed with the staff. Quick service, food delivered as ordered timely and staff cleaning up as quickly as possible. I've managed a bar many years ago and trained staff in customer service in previous career for 15+ years and the staff all deserve an A+! My new neighborhood haunt.

4qds1IYk7pMkJlAyXeEbsg.text: If the bartenders spent as much time taking care of customers as they did jibber jabbing they his would be a 4-5 star place but service is TERRIBLE the guy next to us left after waiting forever for food. Good drinks and food but my god get some real help!!!!!  And for gods sake stop putting the receipts in the drinks it's disgusting.

xFRv9wcbxTkl1ITgTbpqRA.text: First time here... great food, good drinks, but I won't be back. One of the bartenders told the band they were playing elevator music and now the band is leaving. How completely unprofessional of the restaurant. You hired the band, the patrons were enjoying the music. It was NOT elevator music. Yup... unprofessional as I won't be back.

f-Q6nweMD_zImcHFaVn4gg.text: Cool looking place, just don't get the burger, way undercooked and super pink/red, full of gristle on a soggy bun, one of the worst I've ever had...

NIEiTSo9QAD-coAAnSkolg.text: Charli, you are a genuine sweetheart and a business owner who truly wants to succeed. We have talked a few times since our initial meeting over 40 minute fish and chips. You draw great musicians and have some friendly people on staff, Dove is the best. My suggestion would be a smaller menu as is traditional in a pub. I hope things improve as you want them to and wish you all the luck I'm the world.

H24TrdOln-AqqKD4OvXbeg.text: I heard so many great things about this place and was excited to try it tonight. I came in with my girlfriend and was seated right away. The patio was filled with smokers so we asked for a seat inside. After 15 minutes sitting down, I had to flag down a server to place a simple drink order. Order was taken begrudgingly and then delivered incorrectly. Had to flag another server to run our payment. Place is dark inside so recommend to sit next to a window. Not the best first impression.

IgPQ8_EGt2BhG_qFbh8XQA.text: The good: when it finally arrived the food was good.  The bad: incredible slow. 15 minutes to get a drink, even water on the table in addition to alcohol. Food took over 45 minutes to arrive after placing our order. Not many people were eating either. Server never checked on us, apologized (not her fault), offered anything or even refilled our waters. It seemed like she was the only one working besides the bartender. FIX your service issues, have a roaming to make sure people's beverages are topped off, you might even sell a few more rounds, hire some more attentive servers. We have been going to Teakwoods for 20 years. They still pretty much nail it every time with service and food. The one time that they goofed bad the manager proactively came over to our table and comped our meal. The remodel from the old bar to Good Time Charlie's is nice but it was too dark inside. Hope you can fix these things because you can tell the locals want it to be a success.

cYXkXYcPmTSs0v1CRwSXOg.text: I loved the vibe here. We ate the buffalo chicken pizza. It was delicious right down to the crust. Also had the cheese curds and they were tasty too. Beer is always good, but I discovered a new favorite here...Big Blue Van. Now if only I knew were I could find it in Kansas! The live music was also enjoyable!

JSPGe3rd0-0xNgUnkZhRAg.text: Great food! I had the Rueben and it was so yummy! Very cute inside. I went on a Saturday in midafternoon and there was live music. I will definitely be back again!

NRKqjthkFplZGPUeXJdxaw.text: What a great place!  The staff was wonderful , the food delish and atmosphere was awesome!

Gvu4DQ0VG_yLuqXUgsVSTQ.text: Thank you Charlie you made my day this is one excellent restaurant bar entertainment center whatever you like it even has a patio with the pool table OMG the food is excellent actually loaded potato soup baked potato soup oh my goodness the reuben sandwich is the bomb the French fry The BLT I can't wait to go back and try something else thank you

UhtCV0WhlqrMLuc9UCUDOg.text: Went there for the first time last week, had driven by and always wanted to stop in.  Atmosphere is top notch, nice furnishings but not pretentious plenty of TVs for sports.  Nice stage on the inside and acoustic duo on the patio.  Menu is fantastic thought it was going to be simple bar food but it was so much more.  A whole section just for Bruschettas.  Got a steak sandwich and green chile quesadilla and was very happy with both.  The steak was perfectly cooked and seasoned and the portion size was just right.  Beers were ice cold and had a good selection.  If there was a knock on this place it would be the service.  Wait staff was knowledgeable and attentive but I don't think there were enough. Food came out fine but drink reorders were very slow.  Overall a very good find will be going again.

-xDKZoVjWXa5tCVVxd91bw.text: What a joke!! BOGO breakfast offer I received by email ?? Packed house one waitress and one bartender??  Waited over an hour for our order ? I assume one cook? NFL season to boot:( just terrible. Don't offer a deal you if you can't handle it! Food was cold and orders not complete! Where is management???? No where to sit for arriving customers.  UPDATE: The owner reached out to us for the unforeseen impact the bogo deal would have and recognized how understaffed they were. We appreciate it and will be back!

mNay0bTVPjf51o2e-fDA3g.text: Amazing place for a large Birthday party! We had approximately 65 people and I think every single person had an amazing time! The pub provided plenty of space for the party(both inside and out), the balloons, the cake and live music! Charli allowed me to put up many more decorations including a "poster" of the birthday boy at the front entry. And the rustic chic decor made for the perfect Saturday afternoon party atmosphere! The food we had for the party was amazing..... (especially the Cajun dry rub wings) but she really went all out on the fruit platter!. It was simply beautiful!   I would recommend Good Time Charli's for "any" gathering, big or small.  It's a fantastic place!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

1OruC6Y0ZBojkV3L-c8VVA.text: Got the bruschetta for an app, that was tasty. Enchiladas were good, Mac burger was good. Portions were definitely big. Bands and esthetic were great as-well  Would have given 5 but our dinner came out before our appetizer.

wsmhTVoIelbpPvEkkT7YnQ.text: So the main reason I wanted to try this good time Charli's was because there's one in Michigan (Ann arbor to be exact... not sure if they're part of the same chain but still I was curious lol) so we decided to try this little spot out to celebrate my roommate getting into grad school!   We went in on a Tuesday evening, but I would say it was pretty packed haha. I think it's because they have reverse happy hour, as well as different deals almost everyday of the week. We ended up just getting some reverse happy hour drinks (I believe well cocktails were 4.50? Sangria $5 small beer on tap 4 and large beer on tap $5? Something like that haha they were pretty inexpensive that's all I remember) as well as a huge drink called the trash can (fitting for me ). It was pretty good! I didn't drink much so I can't comment on the drinks, but we did order the chicken strips with garlic basil fries and OMG the fries were soooo good, and the chicken strips were surprisingly really juicy. Super yummy for bar food.   The crowd was a bit different from what we're used to, we were prolly the youngest people in there but that's fine! The people were so nice and we made a few friends who happen to be regulars so it was a all in all good time. There's also an electronic juke box which I was hyped about haha   The lost one star because of the service. Our server let us know that he was the only one working all areas of the floor so he must have been swamped, but we decided to move outside because the music was just way too loud where we were sitting. He never came to check up on us, and when we went to get one last drink at the bar & close our our tab, it took (no lie) like 15 mins lol I was waiting to pay all awkward but it's alright. I would come back again!

AeLYXBhSze1s_M9rb26gWQ.text: First time visit for our good friends Bday get together, and this place is awesome!  Place was packed when we first go there at 6:30 on a Saturday but hostess got us a great table with 10min. Party of 6 became party of 10 by 8pm an our waiter was amazing! He kept the drinks flowing, food coming, and even laughed with us. And when we left at 11:30 he had all the checks in order.   So about the vibe... one of the best places we've been to for live music, band was excellent, decor was cool with all the bottle lights, layout is easy to move around and not be all bunched up like other places, and will definitely be back. And we go out a lot to listen to live music.  I'd highly recommend you visit!  A great local bar with fun atmosphere and good music n food.

R9QNRRwsQMYpqrHfquKEdg.text: Great place. Don't go though so we can get a seat. That would be fine, but waiting for an hour while all these seats are open at HH.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Empty seats why many people wait for an hour

iIfcS4mAhRXo54InDZIaLQ.text: I really enjoyed my time at this restaurant. The environment was good; for instance, they had fun, interactive games to play and had ample room for a large group. The service we received was very good as well. The beer assortment is great and the food was delicious. I would highly recommend this place for happy hours and really, any casual get-togethers.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Beer flight and giant connect 4

CDAguSB0UKPbVuzdiVXdDA.text: First time visitor and loved watching the Hamptons Band perform. We danced and drank for hours and this place was HOPPIN! I had dinner too and the food was really yummy. I loved the protein plate and fresh avocado.This is a fun club and I hope to be back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. The Hampton&#39;s Band

0tp7oqa02_W-rVUHBBljKg.text: Been patronizing GTC for a few years and have always found their lunch specials and happy hours to be EXCELLENT - both in quality, diverseness, quantity and value. They also have a very good selection of craft beers on tap!   Our favorites: Sliders, Tacos, Bruschetta, Chicken Fried Steak, Beer, Bloody Mary, More beer.  Can't wait to go back!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Thursday Bruschetta Special

FF4l2_ChvTZxLpxIMjOpLg.text: This was our second visit. The first was for breakfast and the food and service was simply amazing! So we came back for dinner. I ordered the bruschetta board and it came out wrong. It was fixed and tasted great. My daughter ordered Mac and cheese it was over powering with green onions and had a bland taste. We sent it back and asked for rice and beans. The waiter than brought our bill with the Mac and cheese still on it. After my husband asked about it. The waiter said what's the problem to which my husband explained. The waiter than said really because of a couple of onions my husband then replied no because it was over powering onions and did not taste good. He said fine. Just now he came back and literally almost threw the check on the table and stormed off. Really poor service tonight. As an update the owner got back to us and apologized. We will go back for sure.

DUIt-hyD6q1f7KxBIA8Q3w.text: This place looks smaller from the outside but it's actually very large! Super cute decorations and the bar was packed! They have live entertainment both inside and out. The music before the entertainment started was such a good mix too!   The food was delicious and I got a Bloody Mary and it was very tasty.  Defiantly recommend this place, they also have some fun events here! Check it out

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Side salad and a lettuce wrapped burger
Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Delicious pretzels and cheese sauce

GafTpa8OoLUJANE6ISitmQ.text: Wow, I was so impressed at how this place has changed!! I mean it used to be the reagle beagle...  I am so happy it is now Good Time Charlie's! Great interior makeover! It is hip and comfortable! Love how they really opened up the patio! Feels so open and inviting.  Service was up and down, but it was to be understood as it was extremely busy.  The food was delicious, but the drinks even better! Try one of their loaded tots!! Amazia!

7ev7eWg69f0buDvhuRgueA.text: I was there for my friends birthday. It was nice they reserved seating for him. The atmosphere was great for a birthday party. However, my husband and I were there for a half an hour and no one approached us to ask us what we wanted to drink and eat. We left because of this poor customer service.

BMnWNTbCUsat1O7z1Km8Ug.text: The BEST "it's peanut butter jelly time" burger I have EVER HAD! The decor is rustic and modern, friendly staff, a variety of foods on the menu, and loved the ambiance!! They also have promotions every day of the week! I highly recommend!! I will absolutely be back!

nF1EMelnq7S-yYCmL0uwyQ.text: Great spot for live music, great drinks and good food! Staff was fantastic and went out of their way to find a spot for us to see with our aging parents. For sure will be back!

AgYbmCt2T9gh4QuwDp3HkQ.text: Great time on the dog friendly patio. Self proclaimed daughter of the owner, 8 year old Emma, is also an aspiring artist. While she was happy to accept pets and loves from Leroy, she refused a tip in exchange for her artwork stating "my mom (Charli) gets mad if I take tips"  Amazing neighborhood bar that makes you forget you live in a large city for just a few moments. Will 100% return.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States
Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

fVd1sqp5pJ3FOIscElRZfg.text: My wife and I came here for Date Night Sunday Evening.  It was a pretty cool place, we sat out on the Patio and they had live music, always a plus.  It was our first time here, we tried to come a couple weeks ago on a Friday and the wait was 90 minutes.  This Sunday evening wasn't so  busy but they weren't slow either.  The waitress stayed on top of our order, my wife ordered Chicken Kabobs that she loved and I ordered a California Avocado Burger, it was really good.  Side note, the fries that came with my burger were big enough to be it's own meal.    The vibe was great, everyone seemed to be enjoying themselves and the employees seemed to be having a good time as well.    Places like this are rare, I will definitely be back.  I have already checked out their live music schedule, you have to go when they are having live music!

841O2tpB4dqy69O8TwbEFw.text: After a second visit I have found that the food was better than I had expected. The menu varieties were more than would normally expect from a bar. One thing that did surprise me is that they serve breakfast from 10-2 each day. Not many bars do that. The staff as was during my last visit happy to serve and we had not issues with our server, Jen. She was very attentive and took great care of us during our stay. We arrived at 11:30 AM and it was Happy Hour. The Bloody Mary's were only $3 and they were more than worth the price. They add bacon, olives, asparagus, beans and spiced yellow peppers. One of the best I've had in the Phoenix area.  I will be going back to have one of those.   Have been back numerous times and this place still is a 4 star. Good food daily entertainment and fun staff.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Western Fusion. Good tight band.
Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Nathan Dean Band

zhpBIdQ9YxTIm122ZcOV2w.text: Food was great, way exceeded my expectations of "bar food". Asked the bartender for food recommendations, he said all was good, but he liked the tacos. They have a taco combo, 3 tacos and beans, $14. Was way more food than I was expecting, and WAY more protein than I was expecting! Tacos were delicious too! Got a flight of local beers that was really good too. Service was a little slow, I'm sitting at the bar, and had to ask for a food menu, and a drink menu, and had to get a bartenders attention to take my beer order. That's my only reason for docking 1 star.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Smoked pork, salmon and avocado, and barbacoa beef tacos with black beans.

qt9VYjcA173tunZuPBMZxg.text: Amazing Breakfast Amazing Service Amazing Time....We were there Saturday it was beyond packed as it's an Ohio state bar.    But stilll ..... No COMPLAINTS....  our food came out quick and correct.... definitely going back..

MZEhEpdVPTaeFn0PFYfX8Q.text: A friend and I went in at 4 PM. About 5 tables were full. Only ONE server, who was also behind the bar. Needless to say, service was S L O W. I asked for 2 samples of beer. Took a while, but they finally arrived. Server never returned to get my order, so I stood at the bar for a good 5 minutes before she noticed me. Another server finally arrived about 5:30, and the service got better. Good beer selection. Good pizza! Monday night special was $7 for a 12", 2 item. Also got 50 cent wings. The cajun rub, boneless. Not much flavor, but good size. We decided we would go back again; as long as we had time to spare.

wBgok-imPKCGWK72eKByaQ.text: Wow. I think Chandler blvd and kyrene finally found a place that might stay! Great food, local wine on TAP?! Wait, what??? Az stronghold great wine and local, very nice touch! Food was awesome, hubs had pork belly quesadilla and I had sliders, with sweet potato fries. YUM!   I'm just bummed were old and couldn't make it for the band. I'm totally taking a nap next time and will be ready to do some  dancing!

0cPQ6RfhyeztIxwAbknIIA.text: Went to this place on a whim for Thursday night football with a girlfriend. Love the atmosphere, could have done without the dueling pianos but the food and service was great!

eR_AXybWboR7doLSWdy_6Q.text: This is the best bar for any occasion! Food is delicious, beer selection is stellar! Not to mention Ariana and Brittany are the greatest bartenders in all the land!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

Muh_GMVvdbFHYIEiNXZvhQ.text: Love love love this place!!!!! Good food great music AWESOME staff! On the rare occasion Charli's not there to make you feel welcome her staff is more than capable! Brittany has been a friendly and FANTASTIC new addition to Charli's team!!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Picture doesn&#39;t do it justice but this place has a great theme and awesome decor!

Q_YqQX1k0do1bg_iOsr3bg.text: This place is awesome. Lots of fun for all ages it's elegant yet barish. Thursday night is dueling piano night. Friendly service we enjoy visiting.

2IioJg8UBMhnBJa_eaAnKg.text: Went for a quick stayed for an hour. The place was fun food was fantastic. I had Italian Beef. Scrumptious. Daughter had filet sliders. Great great meal service was  quick and place was very nicely decorated. I highly recommend the food service and atmosphere

QnE9sR9HRVIufePYEXdESA.text: Friendly service, if under staffed. Prices are high. Even at Happy Hour. Live music Friday at 4pm is awesome. Bring extra cash and be ready to wait.

3xit2k2obVXfs1qGAmnNLg.text: So glad to have a nice place like this come to the neighborhood.  Great selection of beers, still have your Budlight, Coors and so on, but craft beers from local brewries as well throught the US.  Tried three of the burgers, they were great. Servers were new and in training but handled themselves very well, lots of people checking on us when it was crowded. They take service seriously and were working the kinks of a new business out.  I cannot complain because they gave it all they had and made it work well.  Very happy so much we went back, played 36 holes of golden tee for $10, had a great time. Can't wait to see a band there.  This place will erase your nightmares of local drunk that use to inhabit the Regal Beagle.   Love it.

Nv8r6HezKiX4-BAe7zdyjQ.text: We really wanted this place to work for us, after we Tried 3 separate times and all struck out. Bar staff is great, wait staff is good for the most part, but the kitchen needs some major improvements. First visit our order never got put in and an hour later we ordered without the appetizer, second time kitchen was massively under staffed and we literally got no food, this past time we ordered the pretzel knots and didn't get them for 40min. We were told the first ones got burnt then I pointed out the second ones were not even close to being done on the inside and said we were done only to be told the rest of our order that we placed only a few minutes before was done (trying to say to bad you have to take your order). We talked to the manager and she was apologetic and understood unlike the waitress. Sadly we won't be returning for a 4th time.

tEP-jbjnjzeGVRoREbGleg.text: The service here is horrific if you don't sit at the bar. We've been here several times and the food and drinks are great if you sit at the bar. If you have to sit anywhere else in the bar, you might as well be sitting in your car on the parking lot, since they never get your order or ask if you need another beer. You have to walk back to the bar to ask for something. We walk into the place and walk back out if there's no seats at the bar. It shocks me that management doesn't recognize this as a problem.

rPaGNWKPd-kh1N93RiXasA.text: It was a Friday night, All I ordered was a sandwich and fries waited for an hour and a half, and still no sandwich. Was there for over two hours and got only one glass of iced tea.  When I asked the waitress about my order all I got was attitude she could care less. Will never go there again and will tell anyone who will listen not to go there. Too bad the food don't look half bad.

VaKFAUKto_JUtC4TsqRYhg.text: Haven't yet tried the food, but choices look fabulous! We only stopped in for drinks. Loved the Sunday night jam session, but feel it should start about 7pm rather than 8pm--it's Sunday night! And the chairs aren't the most comfortable. Still, would go back to try the food!

LUSz_3LVKa0a1GVpqvwwEg.text: Second time here.  Really nice beer list on draft and wise on tap as well.  The interior is very nice. The food is similar to a gastropub.  Had the Sonoran dog with fries.  Thought it was very good.  I'll update after this visit. It so far it nice to have a new place nearby.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Mudshark Havablue with a float of blueberries.  Nice touch!

AwpQz0OoNmtAJkiFVc7D7Q.text: The wait staff needs to be better trained as you are over attended to or not attend to at all.   There does not seem to be a system in place.   Last week I sat and waited for service only to have to walk to the bar for my drink.  Last night I was approached by 3 different waitress .. this was good until I needed anoter drink.  none of the wait staff checked if i needed anything.  I decided to leave since service was slow and had to wait over 30 min for for my tab.  Great music and great sound system.

sqcwzz3ysAlWALHn_PsLug.text: Top notch food and service.  The bar staff goes out of their way to make you feel welcome. The cilantro shrimp tacos are my favorite item on the menu. Great selection of local beer, whiskey, and other spirits. Good Time Charli's is locally owned and they do a great job of supporting other local business. My favorite spot in Chandler!

13Ubp4lbGb_rc3yNssi1iA.text: 23 minutes for a glass of wine. By that time I wasn't going to order anything else. I gave my card the moment my wine finally did arrive. Been here 40 minutes now and I just got my check back. I wouldn't want to see how long getting food here would have taken.

5l0kZEd3s7cXdfvFMW0aRA.text: I'm sad to downgrade my rating here. After our first visit we were so enameled that we returned several times-often bringing one or several new people to try what we had thought was in the running for our new favorite place. The first time I was understanding of the slower service due to having invited over 10 people to meet us there. However, each time we have returned, we continue to be underwhelmed by the service-and yet, we keep going back HOPING that all those last half dozen visits were anomalies. Here is the great things about the place:  as most people mention, the decor is just really cool; the menu is extensive and interesting-haven't had anything that wasn't very decent-the other night, a BYOB burger with lettuce wrap and a fried egg and basil garlic fries-OMG; great beer selection and awesome daily drink specials; THE ENTERTAINMENT!!!  Now then, Charli I really hope you take this in the spirit I'm giving it, because again, we WANT to love it. But we haven't been in there once since our first visit where we were even acknowledged by a server before having sat for 10 or more minutes. It makes customers feel small and unimportant when they sit there awkwardly even waiting for a greeting let alone a drink order. I will say that a few times, our service has been perfectly fine AFTER that first long wait. We typically come between 4-6 pm and it's not always terribly busy. Unfortunately, a few times, our service has continued to remain slow for the entire visit. Two days ago, we had the first experience-it took awhile to be noticed (and several other parties who came in after were greeted before us) but afterward things were good-until half our table of 4 was done eating, and then we had a hard time locating our server again for drink refills. Honestly, in the 15 minutes we waited to be helped initially, we considered leaving but in retrospect are glad we stuck around. I hope this place can get their service act perfected because it really has so very much potential. And to be truthful, I will deal with less than stellar food, but, call it my deep-seated and long-lived personal insecurities, being ignored when I'm ASKING to pay for service feels really wrong. Thanks for listening :)

y5ZR3fzJI9S1nTFf65G9GQ.text: Sports Bar atmosphere.  Very noisy.  Good beer selection.  Had the jalapeno cheese curds - would order again.  Rueben was so-so. Meat tender but cold.  Sandwich was fairly dry.  Service fair.  Timely, but nothing special.

7Y8Ej9UBJ-fHye5EiHo7BQ.text: Best place for live entertainment and great food , servers are fast and I would recommend this place!!!

X3xPkKM_y2nx5hJjjZreOg.text: Are you kidding me right now. terrible terrible service. I will give them one thing, it's a cool restaurant and the food was really off the hook. but the service was awful awful awful. I mean awful. Our waiter was so terrible. we had to ask for everything like 3 or 4 times, and had to wait incredibly long amounts of time to get anything that we ask for.. at one point I was sitting there for 20 minutes without any water!! So I went inside and flagged my waiter down, as we were sitting on the patio. I told him that i've been sitting there for 20 minutes waiting for more water. guess what he tells me. he says well, there is a jug of water outside, just go get it.  And I looked at him, and I said, really, dude?? I was so mad, and he had an even worse attitude towards the end of the night. every time that we had to ask him for more things, he started getting really irritated with us. It's sad, because the food was really good, but I'm not going to come back to get service like this ever again.

XI6dFsPh6PIGFmXfIQcMCQ.text: Food is good and people here are really cool. If your looking for a chill bar this is the place to be.

NSE5vxYzGUnS_kB4SprOgw.text: Breakfast is so delicious and no long wait like most nearby places on weekends.    Drink specials are great...cant beat a loaded bloody mary for $4.     Staff is friendly and efficient but not intrusive.  Highly recommend this neighborhood gem.

Aau3AB6PB77LKyuGcNWf2g.text: This place is great. The food is excited and tastes great! The people are very good. It's a great place to have a get together with friends or just a small dinner. They have great drinks!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

qV4s_bAB1NVkfCA98DLF5Q.text: Easily one of my fav bars because it always has good live music and awesome specials!!!! (Also it's within walking distance of where I live lol) I come here probably three times a week because it's that great!!! $3 mimosas on the weekend, $8 pitchers during football, wing and pizza specials and a good atmosphere.... like cmonnnn where else would you rather be??

2Rer2FPjKtb-z0mx3ekB0g.text: One of my favorites bar and grill. I love the ambience. The food is really great and so the serving.

c0GdegZ02ag-UaVRkW78bg.text: Absolutely love this place! Very diverse staff and clientele, always a fun crowd. Music everyday, not surrounded around sports like every other bar, great place for a date or a fun day out with friends.

BoeHJJGw96fuspo3X6mxgQ.text: Good time Charli's should be called GREAT TIME CHARLI'S!! Came on a packed Sunday night. I was able to call ahead to reserve a table for 8 near the stage for dinner. Alex was our server and did a fantastic job. The food and drinks kept coming all night.  The MUSIC was outstanding!!! Didn't know what to expect being our first time, but after watching multiple musicians kept switching things up it was a night we will never forget. They played everything from Johnny Cash, ZZ Top, Bruno Mars to top 40. So much local talent we were very impressed!!! If you want a local bar with great people, service and talent come here. You'll be glad you did!!! :)

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. The talent just keeps coming up on stage
Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. The dance floor is small but it does the trick
Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Our friends having a great time!

6Goms_WWALYLCvGtcDe5wg.text: We frequented this place when it first opened. Unique decor, the food used to be above average bar food with a chef from down south with secret recipes that we're pleasantly unique. The service was consistently sub par (and that's being really nice). I'm a very generous tipper when service anything above average. We stopped coming here because the service just wouldn't come up to an a average level. Well we came back to check it out after a several month hiatus  The only thing that changed is the food just barely makes the average bar food grade. I'm pretty sure they've had a chef change as the pizza that used to have a unique crust is competing with frozen pizza. Anther interesting thing to note is the offer for $5 coupon for online reviews if you show the review to your server. I wonder how many 4-5 star reviews for this place were bought for $5? Service sucks (took almost 5 minutes to even acknowledge us) and our pitcher of beer has been empty for 15 minutes. Won't be back!

1qDL3ztFBO26u7-E9GHEcw.text: Food was decent, but getting any kind of service was a chore. After standing awkwardly at the entrance for an uncomfortable amount of time we were told to sit anywhere. Chose a high top and waited while servers walked by, passing us off to each other. Finally got one who took our drink order, then disappeared. When she brought our drinks, she asked if we wanted menus. We ordered, but the beer and appetizers were served at the same time as the meal. We still didn't have napkins or silverware, and the runner said we'd have to ask someone else for that because he didn't know where it was. The order was wrong and never corrected. Still waiting to see our server and get the check so we can head out and never come back. There's someone arguing with another server that he wants his ID returned, so at least that's entertaining.  There's so much focus on the daily events that service feels like an afterthought. Big mistake.  Update: Got the bill and we were overcharged. Surprise.

toESpTflHtH1c12OslVHxg.text: I want to like this place, I really do. The decor and mood are really nice and I believe that Good Time Charlie's could be great with better service and food. We had three servers help us, the third eventually became our server after drinks and meals were ordered. She did not introduce herself or say anything despite the weird start to our visit. She came up to us several times while we were still eating and drinking asking if we wanted boxes.  When we were ready to pay she was less available.   Now for the food. We ordered wings (honey hot and honey BBQ) and the Doc Holiday burger.   The good: the wings were large and cooked well.  The seasoning on the fries was great  The bad: the burger, despite being undercooked, was not juicy and was basically tasteless. The honey BBQ wings had no flavor, I mean none. Perhaps a hint of sweetness but no BBQ flavor.  Lastly where we were seated we could hear the music from the kitchen loudly playing.   This place could be great, it just needs to work on a couple things.

1suGKLBw-Axu9vwq7pwchQ.text: It's just a bar with bar quality food. Not sure what makes anyone say anything more about this place than exactly that. It's just a bar.   The downside is its got some marginal characters. Bunch of 40 and 50 somethings that are chain smokers and power drinkers, heavily tattooed crowd. If that's your thing, then this is the spot for you!  I felt like I was on a Carnival Cruise eating buffet food.

FBpYSgaodZejatfuVhjs5g.text: This place is amazing! After the horrible week I've had, this place was my escape! Not only is their food fabulous, but they have the best bartenders- especially Ariana- (with drink-creative minds), and hard working bar backs!

mSTecABdboYg-qTXKQpKUA.text: Been here 3 times now. The wings are really good, but thats the only thing (food/drink) above average here. Not a bad place, just not amazing. You can get door dash delivery until 2am (1 am?) though, which definitely sets them apart. Service has always been great, the patio is nice too.  The front dining area is kind of separated from the back area which is great - because the front area can be pretty loud with music/tv. The rear dining area has plenty of tv's - and you can hold a conversation too!

wqeGN93vEsVf6hxrL-IIKQ.text: Wow! The interior is decorated with a lot of car nostalgia and quaint. The menu has a lot of yummy things it was hard to choose a meal. I had the quesadilla and it was so big I found the finish it all! The service was attentive but never over bearing. We were in a large group so I don't get to taste others food. I definitely will return !

L-E1AlhwXtqCONfhXfvKLA.text: Just stumbled across this place while killing time before a flight. Great beer, live music, service and food.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Great live music.

cqls5jGw8o9EVVHn8-K80g.text: Love Good Time Charli's! The atmosphere is inviting and unique. Being here on Thursday for Dueling Pianos is an awesome experience!

I_7Db77IqcdF317P4eHhsg.text: We were very excited about visiting this place as we have heard that they have great bands and decent food. I'm honestly hoping we hit it on an off day.  We walked in to a smelly aroma of perfume air freshener.   I ordered a French dip sandwich that was below average. My husband ordered a hamburger that was below average. The clientele around was getting in verbal fights around us. This seems to be a rough joint!!  I wish this place the best but we won't be back and I hate to say it... don't waste your time or energy on this one....

eg2eCU4-w0nIwMq8XXEMfQ.text: It would be a 5 star for me if the damn high top stools we're not so uncomfortable. Foot is fantastic, and great beer selection.  Live music, just a good time like the title.

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States. Garlic fries with Jalapeno Ranch dipping sauce.

BXYkceT16tEf6sZEGDL_bw.text: My first time here was on a Saturday night and I loved it! They had live bands playing and the entertainment was amazing! The vibes, food and customer service was incredible as well. I highly recommend this place!

QPfdR3K8zAXj7NZwqc2bYg.text: This review hurts a little to give, this is such a great place, live music, great ambiance good food and drink menu and specials!!.....but the service is poor, (great people) but slow and inattentive, there is a noticeable lack of management and delegation. As I said, great friendly people but you need to prep mentally and set aside an allowance of patience for the lackadaisical service, even at the bar sitting in front of the staff they will get to you when they get to you, if it is marginally busy come another day or check your expectations at the door. This otherwise would be a 5 star review hopefully they will decide to get their game face on.

icUzQe8HPe3E6b60yJTWxQ.text: Good Time Charli's was a great time had by all. The food was really good, especially for the happy hour prices. The wait staff was attentive and so friendly! We would definitely come back!

o7UINQd8HQMe3BPpinbuxQ.text: This is the third time I've been here and I will definitely come back often! Great food - such a variety, too, and a decent wine list. Entertainment options are many and the staff really does a good job. The best part - they reward us veterans with 15% discount on our bill - and we appreciate it!

5WHU5IfD4TeHGLrSaSQL8Q.text: Casual bar with live music and typical mediocre bar food. Beer menu has variety but not great options, in my opinion.

K4VO8LcqmB1qtbfTp5iu4Q.text: Good Time Charli's is awesome! The atmosphere is very nice and comfortable.  We had a group of 5 of us. All of our food was amazing! Burgers, salad w/fillet mignon, grilled fish tacos - we each loved our meals and our drinks - especially the selection of beers (and Bonus, they have Heineken!). Our service was fantastic and the waitress was very attentive. We sat in the front near the stage. When the band started, the acoustics were perfect! Not too loud... The band "Tick, Tick, Boom"  was very, very good playing 80s, 90s and current music.    The place was very busy from the time we got there until we left. This place is a Gem. Five stars!

PTMW2iNX-ZsjN_8yHHMhiA.text: The drinks were good (I had a Moscow Mule) and the food was good enough but not super exciting. I'd still go there to drink and play pool and eat if I was hungry but it's not on my gotta go there for the food list. We went there on a holiday so the waitstaff was limited and they did pretty well considering.

FV5HGGA69RrG3sRzPNDgTg.text: Probably the worst bartenders in Chandler very tip dependant on service I've never been so rudely been treated by a bartender. We had a tab that we fully paid for that I'm quite sure had overcharged on it and when I told the server that I was told it couldn't be verified because my server had left for the day. Fine I paid it and tipped the bartender. A few minutes later a different bartender told me I never paid a tab and sure enough I had a different tab, fine I paid that one to then this server a different bartender rudely scolded me for not tipping embarrassing me in front of my guests. Wow you spend over 200 in a dive bar and this is how your treated. I will never go back and I warning all who read this to not go there. You will be overcharged and you will be treated badly.

y83ZbR2l5mE4QvmdF55GYw.text: Monday afternoon it wasn't too busy, sat ourselves. We ordered pizza, fries, and wings. Order came out with just one order of fries that didn't have the garlic it was supposed to, be brought us a second one. Got another ranch and the wings were grilled. The bill is where we were a little shocked...$6 for fries and then $2 more for garlic? I must have interpreted it wrong but the back said a side of fries $2. Then I got charged .50 for ranch and .50 for grilled wings...wish I would have been told this prior to ordering. The food was very basic, ranch almost tasted like mayo. We won't be back, maybe this is just a place for drinks on a Saturday night.

S4iY8Il3W-7odTuUtBZa1g.text: I love dual-piano music. So much for happy hour drinks and great music. Def recommend this place for after work functions

0MXnL9iBoWW3Ok6oFaGbzA.text: A dive bar that is anything but! Great food and drinks. A fun brunch place that I can't wait to go back to. Can't wait to try all their many specials.  Total win!!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

BXkEtWQ3gyTtuLLtOqsVVA.text: Went here for lunch today.  Got our drinks quickly.  But then waited over 20 minutes to place our order.  Finally got to order.  Waiter apologized when  we complained about the wait.  Computers were down.  Someone should have informed us?  We did get $10 off  our bill.  Husband's cheeseburger sliders had no cheese.  Waited awhile to pay, husband finally had to catch a bartender's attn to pay. Had long wait for food the last time we were there too. Guess that's it for us for this place.

XOivBec8TeHTBva5eTx8xQ.text: Great ambiance, very attentive service. I come in late night on the weekends sometimes and Ariana always takes care of me. If you're looking for a laid back spot in west Chandler, I would definitely recommend

bAY4_DGIkFloTXhw4pUz4w.text: What a great neighborhood hideaway. Great pub food and atmosphere. And bonus.. they play kickass rock !

y2PfCMVyuP7eIhSS22HsWw.text: We came here for the first time based on a recommendation from a friend and thoroughly enjoyed it!  The service at the bar (Ariana) was very good.  The wine prices were high by a the glass.   But we had a good time!!

27yp6h9MWNnsU9Qv78tISA.text: Love coming here on sundays...Great place to listen to live music, enjoy patio with  misters and service is awesome!!

O_aZKUmcDQsCRHq3OOGzCg.text: Great food.. had the garlic knots, bruschetta, buffalo chicken sandwich and another chicken sandwich and they were all delicious. Even the Bloody Marys were good! All reasonably priced. Ambiance was amazing and loved the decorations especially the Jack Daniels soap dispenser in the restroom. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because of the overwhelming spicy floral(?) type smell. It unfortunately takes away from the atmosphere and the smell and taste of the food. We came with a party of 14 and everyone seemed please with the food as well as our friendly waitress. I would come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Good Time Charli's Neighborhood Craft Pub - Chandler, AZ, United States

bAxQRgEK_8rVNIgbAYq6zQ.text: Well we attempted this place three times and they have struck out.... love the atmosphere but the kitchen is slow and lacking.... takes over 40minute for appetizer. I thankful for a third attempt of a good and joyful visit....I wouldn't recommend this place.... maybe for a cocktail but that's it. Very disappointed....

fjgiqg_xE_fJZmL-xGRH1A.text: Want a "Good Time " !! Well, Good Time Charli's is the place !! a great social bar, fun, friendly and free entertainment every day of the week. Also, great place to watch all sports on their 20+ TV's with NFL package. Planning a special party ? We just enjoyed a B'Day Party attended by 70 friends that was professionally handled by Charli,Jeremy, Mythia and staff. Check them out on Facebook and/or sign up on their e-mail goodtimecharli's.com. Very satisfied customers. John & Shannon

eXWeTJBBpKutHb4dIdLRXQ.text: Always a fun place with good food and live entertainment. Their grilled wings are fantastic and margarita Wednesday is fantastic. Only $3. Also recently tried the Trashcan drink and it was amazing.

tdoSs0Ur5enlBAi4QAv6Gg.text: Great burgers and strong drinks. Saturday night is a bit of older crowd,  but the vibe is positive. Really enjoyed a relaxing time here
